data.title: Ceylon Tamil Radio Of Canada – CTRC Online Tamil Radio Station Canada
data.text:
FEATURED STATIONS NEAR YOU

Canadian Tamil Radio CTRC 24/7 Live Online. Canadian Tamil Radio is Canada’s leading 24-hour Tamil Radio Channel . It was Founded on December 5, 2022 . It Broadcasts Tamil Music , Talk shows , Live Shows from Toronto Cannada . You can listen to this radio Station online in Laptops , Desktops , Android and Iphone devices and Notepads using google chrome browser . No Need to install any software to listen this radio (App Store and Google Play Need to Download the App its a opption )

Our mission is to spread the love we have for our culture and put together the building blocks for the next generation. We have multitudes of dynamic shows on our radio to keep our community up-to-date on worldwide incidents while giving full enjoyment to our increasingly expanding audience.

Therefore, we kindly request all our musicians and composers living in our motherland and different parts of the world to come and enrich this Radio with their cooperation

Ceylon Tamil Radio Of Canada also known as Radio Ceylon plays Tamil songs of Black & White, 60s, 70s, 80s, 90s, 2k+ & New songs played here 24*7.Ceylon Tamil Radio Of Canada has a wide variety of Tamil Programmes.Listen to Ceylon Tamil Radio Of Canada live online only on Toronto its Free For 24/7 all day
